translation.en: Robert Johnson is considered one of the greatest blues artists of all time.
translation.es: Robert Johnson es considerado uno de los mejores artistas de blues.

translation.en: There's just something sort of supernatural about Robert.
translation.es: Hay algo en Robert que es sobrenatural.

translation.en: This is a level of genius that maybe will only exist once.
translation.es: Su genialidad es única, jamás existirá algo igual.

translation.en: You can't hear a blues tune or a rock tune that
translation.es: No existe canción de blues o de rock

translation.en: don't have some of Robert's chords in it.
translation.es: que no tenga acordes de Robert.

translation.en: You think you're hearing two or three guys playing
translation.es: Parece que tocan dos o tres personas,

translation.en: and it's just one guy.
translation.es: pero es una sola.

translation.en: I went to the crossroads
translation.es: Fui a la encrucijada

translation.en: Fell down on my knees
translation.es: Caí de rodillas

translation.en: It's the template for what became rock and roll.
translation.es: Es la base sobre la que se erigió el rock and roll.

translation.en: The songs and the subject matter, let alone the guitar playing,
translation.es: Las canciones, la temática, más aún cómo toca la guitarra.

translation.en: which is very much like Bach,
translation.es: Se parece a Bach.

translation.en: and the voice is so eerie...
translation.es: Y su voz es muy sombría.

translation.en: Save poor Bob if you please
translation.es: Salven al pobre Bob, si pueden

translation.en: You put that in a class by itself, you know, and Johnson is.
translation.es: Existe una categoría superior, y Johnson está en ella.

translation.en: Standin' at the crossroads
translation.es: Parado en la intersección

translation.en: Because there wasn't that much known about Johnson,
translation.es: Como no se sabía mucho de Johnson,

translation.en: he came with mystery attached.
translation.es: lo rodeaba un halo de misterio.

translation.en: The myth of Robert Johnson still lives today,
translation.es: El mito de Robert Johnson sigue vivo.

translation.en: because there was so many unsolved mysteries.
translation.es: Porque quedaron muchos misterios sin resolver.

translation.en: The music drew us in,
translation.es: La música nos atrajo,

translation.en: but it was the myth that made people believe that there is magic out there.
translation.es: pero fue el mito lo que nos hizo creer que existía la magia.

translation.en: All of us have been trying to figure out the mystery around the man.
translation.es: Todos hemos estado intentando descifrar el misterio que lo rodea.

translation.en: Robert was said to have been a novice guitar player.
translation.es: Se decía que Robert tocaba la guitarra como un aprendiz.

translation.en: Not very good.
translation.es: Que no era muy bueno.

translation.en: So he went away and came back playing so good,
translation.es: Se fue un tiempo, y cuando volvió tocaba tan bien

translation.en: that everybody says, He did something.
translation.es: que todos decían: Hizo algo.

translation.en: The legend is he went to the crossroads,
translation.es: Cuenta la leyenda que fue a la encrucijada.

translation.en: he met the devil there,
translation.es: A verse con el diablo.

translation.en: he sold his soul,
translation.es: Le vendió su alma.

translation.en: and then he became the greatest guitar player in the world.
translation.es: Y así se convirtió en el mejor guitarrista del mundo.

translation.en: But how much is myth
translation.es: Pero ¿qué parte es mito

translation.en: and how much is real?
translation.es: y qué parte es real?

translation.en: There's very little known about the life of Robert Johnson.
translation.es: Se sabe muy poco de la vida de Robert Johnson.

translation.en: In fact, there are only two known photos.
translation.es: De hecho, solo hay dos fotos de él.

translation.en: And no footage.
translation.es: No hay videos.

translation.en: I've spent the last 50 years...
translation.es: Los últimos 50 años

translation.en: studying the life and music of Robert Johnson.
translation.es: estudié la vida y música de Robert Johnson.

translation.en: Robert Johnson had a very short recording career.
translation.es: Robert Johnson tuvo una breve carrera discográfica.

translation.en: We only have 29 compositions.
translation.es: Solo tenemos 29 composiciones.

translation.en: And he died so young, at the age of 27.
translation.es: Y murió muy joven. A los 27.

translation.en: I first found out that Robert Johnson was my grandfather
translation.es: Descubrí que Robert Johnson era mi abuelo

translation.en: when I was about 15 years old.
translation.es: a los 15 años, aproximadamente.

translation.en: When I first heard Robert Johnson, I was like,
translation.es: Oí por primera vez a Robert Johnson y dije:

translation.en: Okay, that's what music is.
translation.es: Esto es música de verdad.

translation.en: And there's so much we don't know about him,
translation.es: Sabíamos muy poco de él,

translation.en: so I read everything I could get my hands on.
translation.es: así que leí todo lo que pude.

translation.en: I became a scholar of Johnson by reading everything I possibly could,
translation.es: Me volví experto en Johnson al leer todo lo que pude

translation.en: by listening to all his music,
translation.es: y oír toda su música.

translation.en: but also as a musician,
translation.es: Pero también, como músico,

translation.en: I was trying to get inside and understand what his state of mind was.
translation.es: intenté adentrarme en él y entender su talante.

translation.en: When I heard Robert Johnson,
translation.es: Cuando oí a Robert Johnson,

translation.en: I said, This is the top of the tower,
translation.es: me dije: Esta es la punta de la lanza.

translation.en: and I gotta figure out what that is.
translation.es: Y tengo que descubrir qué es.

translation.en: But it wasn't a conscious decision,
translation.es: Y no fue algo consciente,

translation.en: it was just like, that's what I knew I wanted to do.
translation.es: sino que ahí supe que eso era lo que quería hacer.

translation.en: I remember my grandfather saying,
translation.es: Recuerdo que mi abuelo decía:

translation.en: That old boy from the Delta, Robert Johnson, always hung out at the graveyard.
translation.es: Ese Robert Johnson se la pasaba en el cementerio.

translation.en: - - And then he started talking about, Him the devil, done this and done that.
translation.es: Y luego me dijo: És el diablo. Hizo esto y aquello.

translation.en: And it just brung a lot of curiousness about this man.
translation.es: Y eso me generó mucha curiosidad.

translation.en: There was one cut by Robert Johnson on this country blues record
translation.es: Escuché un tema de Robert Johnson en un disco de country blues

translation.en: and it just stood out.
translation.es: y me llamó la atención.

translation.en: So I made it a quest to find out as much as I could about him.
translation.es: Así que me propuse aprender todo lo que pudiera sobre él.

translation.en: I made countless trips to his hometown, Hazlehurst, Mississippi,
translation.es: Viajé muchas veces a su pueblo natal, Hazlehurst, Misisipi,

translation.en: talking to everyone that I could find who knew him.
translation.es: y hablé con todo aquel que lo conoció.

translation.en: I would just drive until I saw somebody sitting on their porch outside and I'd just pull up.
translation.es: Conducía hasta que veía a alguien sentado en su porche, y me paraba.

translation.en: And there'd just be so much information that you could get
translation.es: Conseguí muchísima información

translation.en: just by cold calling people, you know?
translation.es: con solo llamar a la gente por teléfono.

translation.en: Did you and Robert go together for a while?
translation.es: ¿Robert y usted salieron un tiempo?

translation.en: I guess about six or seven months, something like that.
translation.es: Creo que durante seis o siete meses.

translation.en: Before he left and went somewhere to make records.
translation.es: Antes de que se fuera a grabar discos.

translation.en: He said he's going to make... make some records.
translation.es: Dijo que se iba a grabar un disco.

translation.en: It wasn't until 1967...
translation.es: No fue sino hasta 1967...

translation.en: that Robert's death certificate was discovered.
translation.es: ACTA DE DEFUNCIÓN ...que apareció el acta de defunción de Robert.

translation.en: And with that discovery, we learned who his mother was,
translation.es: A partir de ese hallazgo, se supo quién era su madre,

translation.en: we learned who is father was,
translation.es: quién era su padre,

translation.en: and we learned the first real facts about Robert Johnson.
translation.es: y se conocieron los primeros datos reales sobre Robert Johnson.

translation.en: So, little by little,
translation.es: De a poco, con registros del censo, directorios de la ciudad...

translation.en: using census records, city directories,
translation.es: De a poco, con registros del censo, directorios de la ciudad... DECIMOCUARTO CENSO DE EE. UU.

translation.en: death certificates, marriage licenses...
translation.es: ...actas de defunción, de matrimonio,

translation.en: More and more information came out,
translation.es: apareció cada vez más información.

translation.en: and each time a piece of information would come out,
translation.es: Cada vez que se descubría algo nuevo,

translation.en: it would be like a new key that would open up yet another door.
translation.es: era como encontrar una llave que abría otra puerta.

translation.en: They said you were wearin' some orange.
translation.es: Dijeron que ibas de naranja.

translation.en: Hey, Steve...
translation.es: - Buen día. - Hola, Steve.

translation.en: Down at the crossroads
translation.es: En la encrucijada

translation.en: Dark gon' catch me here
translation.es: La oscuridad me va a atrapar

translation.en: My grandfather, Robert Johnson, was born in Hazlehurst, Mississippi.
translation.es: Mi abuelo, Robert Johnson, nació en Hazlehurst, Misisipi.

translation.en: His mother was Julia Dodds
translation.es: Su madre era Julia Dodds,

translation.en: and she was married to Charles Dodds.
translation.es: y estaba casada con Charles Dodds.

translation.en: Charles Dodds was a wealthy carpenter and farmer.
translation.es: Charles Dodds era un carpintero y granjero acaudalado.

translation.en: But some local white people resented his success
translation.es: Pero algunos blancos envidiaban su éxito,

translation.en: and he was forced to flee to Memphis to escape a lynch mob.
translation.es: y debió irse a Memphis para huir de una banda de linchadores.

translation.en: Julia was left destitute
translation.es: Julie quedó en la calle

translation.en: and took up with a local lumber camp worker,
translation.es: y se involucró con un peón del aserradero

translation.en: who would become Robert's biological father.
translation.es: quien sería el padre biológico de Robert.

translation.en: This was the home...
translation.es: Esta fue la casa...

translation.en: in all probability,
translation.es: ...muy probablemente,

translation.en: where Robert Johnson was actually born.
translation.es: donde nació Robert Johnson.

translation.en: Here it is,
translation.es: Aquí está,

translation.en: this beyond- modest place...
translation.es: un lugar de lo más modesto,

translation.en: ...that somehow has persisted
translation.es: que, de alguna forma, perduró...

translation.en: for more than a century.
translation.es: ...más de un siglo.

translation.en: The fact that it survives...
translation.es: Que haya sobrevivido...

translation.en: it's kind of like a metaphor for Robert's life.
translation.es: ...es una metáfora de la vida de Robert.

translation.en: As far as my information goes,
translation.es: Según lo que tengo entendido,

translation.en: he was always pushed from one house to another house,
translation.es: se la pasó de casa en casa,

translation.en: from Memphis to the Delta to Arkansas,
translation.es: de Memphis, a la Región del Delta, a Arkansas.

translation.en: and I think his mom even walked out on him at one point.
translation.es: Hasta su madre lo dejó en una ocasión.

translation.en: So he never had a stable home and a stable environment.
translation.es: Nunca tuvo un hogar estable ni un entorno estable.

translation.en: He never had a father figure that accepted him for who he was.
translation.es: Nunca tuvo una figura paterna que lo aceptara como era.

translation.en: Years went by,
translation.es: Pasaron los años,

translation.en: until eventually Robert Johnson's mother remarried.
translation.es: y la madre de Robert Johnson se volvió a casar.

translation.en: Robert moved in with his new stepfather, a sharecropper.
translation.es: Robert se mudó con su padrastro, un aparcero.

translation.en: I heard his stepfather used to abuse him.
translation.es: Escuché que solía maltratarlo.

translation.en: Because he didn't want to go work in the fields, he would beat him.
translation.es: Lo golpeaba porque no quería trabajar en el campo.

translation.en: Johnson looked at his stepfather, who was a sharecropper,
translation.es: Johnson vio a su padrastro, un aparcero,

translation.en: and saw what a bad deal it was
translation.es: y vio que no era nada bueno

translation.en: to get hooked up to a plow and a boss, and said, I'm gonna be free. I'm not gonna do that.
translation.es: estar atado a un arado y a un jefe, y dijo: Yo seré libre. No haré eso.

translation.en: I'm not gonna get ripped off that way.
translation.es: No me estafarán así.

translation.en: But as a race, we didn't have much to choose from as far as work goes.
translation.es: Los de nuestra raza no tenían opciones en cuanto al trabajo.

translation.en: It was the field
translation.es: O trabajaban en el campo

translation.en: or basically nothing.
translation.es: o no trabajaban.

translation.en: So, he wanted to make his living with the blues.
translation.es: Él quería vivir del blues.

translation.en: Long fingers, playing the guitar, he didn't want to mess his fingers up.
translation.es: Con dedos largos tocaba la guitarra, y no quería lastimárselos.

translation.en: He'd come to the field and play for somebody
translation.es: Solía venir al campo a tocar para la gente,

translation.en: to make a nickel or dime, you know.
translation.es: para ganarse unos centavos.

translation.en: The big deal was Will Dockery's plantation.
translation.es: El mejor lugar era la finca de Will Dockery.

translation.en: Outside of Robinsonville.
translation.es: GRANJAS DOCKERY A las afueras de Robinsonville.

translation.en: People worked there all week long.
translation.es: Trabajaban toda la semana.

translation.en: No radios, no music, no entertainment.
translation.es: No había radio. Ni música ni entretenimiento.

translation.en: But, on the weekend, the musicians came out.
translation.es: Pero los fines de semana aparecían los músicos.

translation.en: It served as a balm for people who were in bondage.
translation.es: Eran un bálsamo para los esclavos.

translation.en: And it gave you a way out.
translation.es: Y era una escapatoria.

translation.en: You play that music, you could be outside of yourself.
translation.es: Con la música podías escapar.

translation.en: You know, you could take everybody else out. You know, outside of their selves.
translation.es: Y podías lograr que todos escaparan de su realidad.

translation.en: I do believe, pretty baby
translation.es: Yo sí creo, hermosa

translation.en: Believe I'll dust my broom
translation.es: Que ya he terminado aquí

translation.en: Most all these church folk, you say, Where the blues come from? It came from the church.
translation.es: Si preguntas de dónde viene el blues, te dirán que de la iglesia.

translation.en: But that's a lie.
translation.es: Pero es mentira.

translation.en: It didn't come from the church, it came from the field.
translation.es: No viene de la iglesia, sino del campo.

translation.en: Out there in the field, they was playing instruments.
translation.es: Allá, en el campo, solían tocar instrumentos.

translation.en: Harmonica.
translation.es: La armónica.

translation.en: Oh baby this and oh baby that.
translation.es: Cariño, no hay ningún nene ahí

translation.en: Somebody gonna hurt you, woman Like you hurt me
translation.es: Alguien te dañará como tú me dañaste

translation.en: Weren't even talking about the woman.
translation.es: No se refería a una mujer.

translation.en: Talking about the man he's working for.
translation.es: Sino al jefe.

translation.en: Nobody played the blues like the Mississippi folks.
translation.es: Nadie tocaba blues como la gente de Misisipi.

translation.en: Because it's something that was in 'em already.
translation.es: Porque ya lo llevaban dentro.

translation.en: The musicians would play for the sharecroppers,
translation.es: Los músicos tocaban para los aparceros,

translation.en: but the sharecroppers didn't have any money.
translation.es: pero estos no tenían dinero.

translation.en: But city folks did.
translation.es: Los citadinos, sí.

translation.en: So if you were a black musician at that time,
translation.es: Así que, si eras un músico negro en esa época,

translation.en: you strap a guitar to your back, you stick your thumb out,
translation.es: te atabas una guitarra a la espalda, pedías aventón

translation.en: and you just go from town to town.
translation.es: e ibas de pueblo en pueblo.

translation.en: You would travel by bus, train, walking down the street.
translation.es: Viajabas en autobús, en tren, a pie.

translation.en: However you could get there, and perform anywhere you could.
translation.es: Llegabas como podías y tocabas donde podías.

translation.en: On a street corner, in a juke joint.
translation.es: En una esquina, en un bar.

translation.en: Anywhere that there was an audience.
translation.es: En donde hubiera público.

translation.en: If you're obsessed with remaining free from the cotton fields,
translation.es: Si quieres huir de los campos de algodón,

translation.en: you gotta be able to play what people want,
translation.es: tocas lo que le gusta a la gente.

translation.en: so they played polkas, country music, pop songs.
translation.es: Así que tocaban polcas, música country, canciones pop.

translation.en: Also, by setting up on the sidewalk, the word would get out
translation.es: Además, al tocar en la calle, se corría la voz de que habían llegado músicos.

translation.en: that these musicians were in town.
translation.es: se corría la voz de que habían llegado músicos.

translation.en: The owner of a juke would get in touch with them and say, Well, you know,
translation.es: El dueño de algún bar los buscaba y les decía:

translation.en: can you come and play at my place tonight?
translation.es: ¿Pueden tocar en mi bar hoy?.

translation.en: The juke joint was in city limits,
translation.es: El garito de aparceros estaba en la afueras.

translation.en: where black peoples could go and have a good time in town.
translation.es: Los negros podían ir y divertirse en el pueblo.

translation.en: They would dance, play music, drink beer, gamble.
translation.es: Bailaban, tocaban música, bebían cerveza, apostaban.

translation.en: Just together, you know, for the community.
translation.es: Juntos, en comunidad.

translation.en: Robert would work a town until he had it worked out...
translation.es: Robert tocaba en un pueblo hasta agotarlo.

translation.en: ...and then just get back on the road and go to the next town.
translation.es: Y luego partía de nuevo, hacia el próximo pueblo.

translation.en: Robert Johnson on the road in his 20s, it was dangerous.
translation.es: Robert Johnson tenía veintitantos y viajaba. Era peligroso.

translation.en: It was extremely dangerous.
translation.es: Muy peligroso.

translation.en: For a black man,
translation.es: Para un negro,

translation.en: Mississippi was one of the most dangerous places in the world.
translation.es: Misisipi era de los lugares más peligrosos del mundo.

translation.en: If you lived in the upper south like the Virginias, even the Carolinas,
translation.es: Al norte en Virginia,Virginia Occidental, Carolina del Norte y del Sur,

translation.en: the master would threaten you.
translation.es: el amo te amenazaba.

translation.en: You don't act right, I'm gonna send you down Mississippi.
translation.es: Si no te portas bien, te enviaré a Misisipi.

translation.en: I'm gonna sell you.
translation.es: Te venderé.

translation.en: And people were like,
translation.es: El esclavo decía:

translation.en: Whatever you do, please don't send me down there,
translation.es: Haga lo que haga, por favor, no me envíe allí,

translation.en: 'cause they knew how badly they treated people.
translation.es: pues sabían lo mal que trataban a la gente.

translation.en: You're a black person, then you could be killed, lynched,
translation.es: Si eras negro, podían matarte, lincharte...

translation.en: just on a whim.
translation.es: ...sin razón.

translation.en: Boy, I don't like you.
translation.es: No me agradas.

translation.en: What do you say, fellas? Come on, let's...
translation.es: ¿Qué dicen, muchachos? Vamos a....

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.es: Sí.

translation.en: There were more lynchings in the Mississippi Delta than anyplace else.
translation.es: Linchaban a más gente en la Región Delta de Misisipi que en ningún otro lugar.

translation.en: But it wasn't only the danger that made life difficult.
translation.es: Y no era difícil vivir solo por el peligro. AYER HUBO LINCHAMIENTO

translation.en: A life on the road was even harder
translation.es: La vida en carretera era más difícil

translation.en: because most of the people in the towns were Christian,
translation.es: porque la mayoría de la gente era cristiana,

translation.en: and the blues to them were considered the devil's music.
translation.es: y para ellos, el blues era música diabólica.

translation.en: Sunday morning come.
translation.es: Domingo en la mañana.

translation.en: You got the preacher.
translation.es: Estaba al pastor.

translation.en: He ain't making no money.
translation.es: Sin un centavo.

translation.en: - All your men's mostly at the juke joint. -
translation.es: La mayoría de los hombres seguía en el garito. Los músicos tocaban toda la noche.

translation.en: Juke house been partying all night long.
translation.es: seguía en el garito. Los músicos tocaban toda la noche.

translation.en: People don't want me to tell it like this, but that's the way it is.
translation.es: A nadie le gusta que lo cuente, pero así era.

translation.en: - - The preacher,
translation.es: El pastor

translation.en: he got a service going on.
translation.es: oficiaba la misa.

translation.en: Nobody there but the womens.
translation.es: Solo había mujeres.

translation.en: The juke joint and juke house.
translation.es: En estos garitos

translation.en: These people are making a little money.
translation.es: ganaban un poco de dinero.

translation.en: But Reverend ain't making none.
translation.es: Pero el pastor, no.

translation.en: You're gonna go to hell for listening to that devil music.
translation.es: Irás al infierno por oír esa música diabólica.

translation.en: The Baptist preachers started that.
translation.es: Los pastores bautistas iniciaron eso.

translation.en: Somebody get cut, somebody get in a fight,
translation.es: Si alguien se cortaba o se peleaba,

translation.en: that devil music is causing all this.
translation.es: era por la música diabólica.

translation.en: When the preacher put that myth out there,
translation.es: Los pastores decían esas cosas,

translation.en: these womens in church, they started telling some of their husbands,
translation.es: y las mujeres se lo decían a sus esposos.

translation.en: Look, y'all don't start coming to church, you can go to hell listening to devil music.
translation.es: Si no vas a la iglesia, irás al infierno por esa música.

translation.en: Local legend has it
translation.es: Cuenta la leyenda...

translation.en: that...
when he was 18 years old,
translation.es: ...cuando tenía 18 años,

translation.en: Robert Johnson fell in love
translation.es: Robert Johnson se enamoró

translation.en: with a 15- year- old named Virginia Travis.
translation.es: de una chica de 15 años llamada Virginia Travis.

translation.en: They lied about their ages and got married.
translation.es: Mintieron sobre su edad y se casaron.

translation.en: Her family were church people and very religious,
translation.es: La familia de ella iba a la iglesia y era muy religiosa,

translation.en: as were most people in that community on a plantation.
translation.es: como la mayoría de la gente de las plantaciones.

translation.en: Robert made a pledge to Virginia
translation.es: Robert le prometió a Virginia

translation.en: that he would give up playing music
translation.es: que dejaría de tocar música,

translation.en: and he would become a legitimate farmhand
translation.es: que trabajaría en el campo

translation.en: and he would be a good husband.
translation.es: y sería un buen esposo.

translation.en: So they moved to a plantation
translation.es: Se mudaron a una plantación

translation.en: and lived there
translation.es: y vivieron allí

translation.en: until Virginia was eight- and- a- half months pregnant.
translation.es: hasta el octavo mes de embarazo de Virginia.

translation.en: Virginia left to be with her grandmother to give birth to their baby,
translation.es: Virginia se fue a vivir con su abuela para dar a luz.

translation.en: while Robert took advantage of the fact that Virginia was gone to start playing the guitar again.
translation.es: Robert aprovechó que Virginia no estaba y volvió a tocar la guitarra.

translation.en: He decided to work his way through some of his old familiar haunts
translation.es: Decidió trabajar en los lugares que ya conocía

translation.en: along the Mississippi River, up Highway 1,
translation.es: a lo largo del río Misisipi, por la carretera 1,

translation.en: and arrive in time to see his wife and their new baby.
translation.es: y regresar a tiempo para ver a su esposa y a su bebé.

translation.en: Well, Robert didn't make it in time.
translation.es: Pero Robert no llegó a tiempo.

translation.en: Virginia died in childbirth
translation.es: Virginia murió durante el parto,

translation.en: and was already dead and buried with the baby.
translation.es: y ya la habían enterrado junto al bebé.

translation.en: And I followed her
translation.es: La seguí

translation.en: To the station
translation.es: A la estación

translation.en: Well, you know I followed that girl down to the station
translation.es: Ya sabes Seguí a la chica hasta la estación

translation.en: With a suitcase in my hand
translation.es: Con una maleta en la mano

translation.en: If you can just imagine this, I mean, it must've been

translation.en: I think it's reflecting on a tradition in African American folklore called hoodoo.

translation.en: We have a fascination
translation.es: Nos fascinamos

translation.en: with the person who holds great promise,
translation.es: con las personas que tienen mucho potencial,

translation.en: but that promise seems to be snuffed out prematurely.
translation.es: pero parece que ese potencial se extingue prematuramente.

translation.en: It has to do with us trying to find something fantastic
translation.es: Tiene que ver con el hecho de que queremos encontrar algo fantástico

translation.en: that makes our life a little bit more interesting,
translation.es: que hace nuestra vida un poquito más interesante,

translation.en: and possibly, a little bit more dangerous.
translation.es: y, posiblemente, un poquito más peligrosa.

translation.en: It allows us to think that we're dancing on the edge.
translation.es: Nos permite pensar que bailamos al borde del peñasco.

translation.en: Myth is so powerful
translation.es: El mito es muy poderoso

translation.en: because people want to feel like they have the reasoning behind things,
translation.es: porque la gente quiere conocer el trasfondo de las cosas

translation.en: to feel like they know.
translation.es: y saber qué pasa.

translation.en: A lot of things are not for us to understand.
translation.es: Pero muchas cosas jamás las entenderemos.

translation.en: Me and the devil
translation.es: El diablo y yo

translation.en: Was walkin' side- by- side...
translation.es: Estábamos caminando a la par

translation.en: I believe Robert Johnson was extremely talented,
translation.es: Creo que Robert Johnson era extremadamente talentoso,

translation.en: extremely gifted, and way off- balance.
translation.es: extremadamente dotado y muy desequilibrado.

translation.en: You can hear it in the music.
translation.es: Se aprecia en la música.

translation.en: ...was walkin' side- by- side...
translation.es: Caminando a la par

translation.en: Something's spinning strangely in that man's life,
translation.es: Había algo extraño en la vida de ese hombre,

translation.en: and it was with Jimi Hendrix,
translation.es: al igual que con Jimi Hendrix,

translation.en: it was with Kurt Cobain,
translation.es: al igual que con Kurt Cobain,

translation.en: and the rest of the people in the 27 Club.
translation.es: y con los demás miembros del Club de los 27.

translation.en: I don't know about the 27 Club and the deal with the devil,
translation.es: No sé nada del Club de los 27 ni del trato con el diablo,

translation.en: but I do know that at some point in everyone's life,
translation.es: pero sí sé que, en algún momento de la vida,

translation.en: we come to a crossroads,
translation.es: llegaremos a una encrucijada

translation.en: and we all have to choose how much we can sacrifice
translation.es: y tendremos que decidir cuánto podemos sacrificar

translation.en: in order to achieve greatness.
translation.es: para alcanzar la grandeza.

translation.en: Down by the highway side
translation.es: Al costado de la carretera

translation.en: So my old evil spirit
translation.es: Para que mi espíritu maligno

translation.en: Can get a Greyhound bus and ride
translation.es: Pueda subirse al autobús e irse
